WhatIs.Content: Health Daily Link (HDL) is a comprehensive web app designed to help individuals track their health-related activities and stay consistent with their wellness goals. From daily routines like diet and hydration to broader metrics like sleep and weight tracking, HDL makes it simple to log, monitor, and analyze your progress.
WhatIs.Title: What is Health Daily Link

Manual.DashboardDesc: The weekly summary of your tracked data, including diet consumption, diet schedule, water schedule, SportSessions, sleep cycles, and medicine consumption
Manual.DietConsumptionDesc: Record actual consumption of foods and beverages, compare it with scheduled meals, and view previous inputs in a weekly calendar
Manual.DietConsumptionHowItWorks1: Pick a scheduled meal to auto-fill the supposed elements
Manual.DietConsumptionHowItWorks2: Add optional notes for the entire meal or individual elements
Manual.DietConsumptionHowItWorks3: Ensure exact spelling and formatting for accurate comparison
Manual.DietConsumptionHowItWorks4: Scheduled data must be filled beforehand
Manual.DietScheduleDesc: Define your diet plan with schedules, meals, and detailed elements for each meal
Manual.DietScheduleMealElementsDesc1: Define elements for each meal, including name, quantity, and measurement unit
Manual.DietScheduleMealElementsDesc2: Specify allowed alternatives with matching specs
Manual.DietScheduleScheduleMealsDesc: List meals with names and scheduled consumption times
Manual.DietScheduleSchedulesDesc: Adopt a new schedule with order and start date
Manual.LabTestsDesc: Store results of blood tests with optional inputs based on the tests conducted
Manual.MedicineConsumptionDesc: Track medication intake based on predefined schedules and view data in a monthly calendar
Manual.MedicineScheduleDesc: Define medication schedules with detailed consumption instructions
Manual.SleepCyclesDesc: Track your daily sleep patterns and view previous inputs in a monthly calendar
Manual.SportSessionsDesc: Monitor your physical activities and view previous inputs in a monthly calendar
Manual.WateringDesc: Track your water intake to ensure you meet the minimum consumption level
Manual.WeightReadingsDesc: Record weekly weight readings, including detailed measurements specific to the InBody 120 scale

WeightReadings.Total Number of WeightReadings (Nutritio: Total Number of Weight Readings (Nutritionist Weekly Visits)
